pages.text: 38|27|hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul changjoham-eun mogjeog-i iss-eossnola geugeos-eun bulsinjadeul-ui geuleusdoen saeng-gag-eulo bulsinhaneun jadeul-egeneunbuljieug-ui beol-i iss-eulila

38|28|hananim-i mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eul jisang-eseo haeag-eul jeo jileun jadeulcheoleom daeuhandan mal-inyo hananim-i saagham-eul meollihaneun jawasaaghan jaleul dong-ilhage dalul su issgessneunyo
38|29|yeogie hananim-i geudaeege gyesihan seongseoga issnani chugbog-eulo chungmanhasa geugeos-eulo geudeul-i malsseum-eulsuggohago geugeos-eulo salamdeul-i gyohun-eul bad-a deul-igoja ham-ila
38|30|hananim-eun dawis-ege adeullo sollomon-eul jueoss-euni geuneun hullyunghan jong-ieossdeola geulihayeo geuneun hananim-egelo gwiui hayeossdeola
38|31|ohuga doeeo geuui ap-eulo maldeul-i natana seo iss-euni anjeongha go dallim-e sinsoghaessdeola
38|32|geuga malhagil sillo naneun nauijunim-eul yeom-wonhaneun geos gat-i geugeos-eul salanghaess-euni taeyang-i bam-ui beil sog eulo sum-eul ttaekkajiyeossdeola
38|33|geuga naegelo igeos-eul gajyeo ola hadeoni baldeulgwa mogdeul-eul naelyeo chigi sijaghadeola
38|34|hananim-eun sollomon-eul siheomhayeoss euni geuui ogjwa-e han sicheleul noh go junim-ui jabileul guhayeossdeola
38|35|geuga malhagil juyeo gwan-yong-eul bepul-eo jusoseo geuligo nae da-eum-e neun oji ani hal wang-gug-eul jusoseo sillo dangsin-eun eunhyeleul bepusineun su yeojaisibnida
38|36|geuhu hananim-eun balam-eulo ha yeogeum geuege sunjongtologhani geuui myeonglyeong-e ttala geuga wonhaneun gos-eulo yusunhage heulleogadeola
38|37|satangwa mogsudeulgwa mul-e deul-eo ganeun jadeuldo geuleohge hadolog haess-eu myeo
38|38|soesaseul-e hamkke mug-yeo issneun geudeuldo geuleohge hadolog haessnani
38|39|igeos-i hananim-ui eunhyela ne ga geugeos-eulo tain-ege buyeohadeun ttoneun nega geugeos-eul bogwanhadeon gyesan-e daehayeo jilmun-eul badji anihalila
38|40|geuleohge hayeo geuneun hananim ga kkai ileumae choehuui ansigcheolo a leumdaun gos-i issdeola
38|41|hananim-ui jong yol-eul sang-gihala geuneun junimkke gang-guhagil satan-i go tong-gwa jaenan-eulo jeoleul goelobhinaida
38|42|ittae malsseum-i iss-eossnola ne bal lo ttaelila yeogie ssis-eul mulgwa masi gie kkaekkushan mul-i iss-eul geos-ila
